name: yluride
description: YLURide - Luxury Mercedes Van Rental Service

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../backend/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/build backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm cache clean --force && npm install

author: Silver Fox Media Co
